# Project Spoon.py
import math
a=[1, 1, 2, 3, 6, 10, 20, 35, 70, 126, 252, 462, 924, 1716, 3432, 6435, 12870, 24310, 48620, 92378, 184756, 352716, 705432, 1352078, 2704156, 5200300, 10400600, 20058300, 40116600, 77558760, 155117520L, 300540195L, 601080390L, 1166803110L, 2333606220L, 4537567650L, 9075135300L, 17672631900L, 35345263800L, 68923264410L, 137846528820L, 269128937220L, 538257874440L, 1052049481860L, 2104098963720L, 4116715363800L, 8233430727600L, 16123801841550L, 32247603683100L, 63205303218876L, 126410606437752L, 247959266474052L, 495918532948104L, 973469712824056L, 1946939425648112L, 3824345300380220L, 7648690600760440L, 15033633249770520L, 30067266499541040L, 59132290782430712L, 118264581564861424L, 232714176627630544L, 465428353255261088L, 916312070471295267L, 1832624140942590534L, 3609714217008132870L, 7219428434016265740L, 14226520737620288370L, 28453041475240576740L, 56093138908331422716L]

t=int(raw_input())
# t=1

for i in range(t):
	# n=4
	j=0
	n=int(raw_input())
	while(n>a[j]):
		j+=1

	print j
